data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Ifugao.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ifugao, Philippines

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Ifugao, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ifugao, Philippines.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Ifugao, Philippines.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 28,264 believers in Ifugao.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Ifugao, Philippines to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ifugao, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Ifugao, Philippines will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

location.name: Ifugao
location.people_groups_list: Karao, Kalanguya, Tinoc, Kankanaey, Inibaloi, Iwaak
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karao (2,300), Kalanguya, Tinoc (14,000), Kankanaey (263,000), Inibaloi (200,000), Iwaak (4,700)
